testcase.name: REST API testing
testcase.system-out: Given url "http://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/employees" .............. passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match responseType == 'json' .......................................... passed * match response.status == "success" ...................................... passed * match response.status == "#string" ...................................... passed * match response.data == "#array" ......................................... passed * print response.data[0].employee_name .................................... passed * match response.data[0].employee_name contains "Tiger" ................... passed
